name: Tap or Die :)
description:
IMPORTANT READ - HOW THE GAME WORKS
Tap or Die :) is a totally random game where you have to click the ball in the middle when it changes color.
Your objective is to make the most points you can.
Also if you click the ball in the middle when it's blue (it's default color) you will lose a point.
The game will get harder every time you make a point!


Comment your score, if you can beat the 0 ;)
